last_episode_to_air.name: Gathering
last_episode_to_air.overview: Unconscious within the beast, Kall-Su has flashbacks to his past. Determined to save his friend, Dark Schneider wields majestic powers like no other.

name: BASTARD‼ -Heavy Metal, Dark Fantasy-
overview: When evil forces threaten to resurrect Anthrasax, the God of Destruction, the Kingdom of Meta-llicana calls on a volatile dark wizard for help.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: With the fall of Meta-llicana Castle and Dark Schneider, Kall-Su continues to terrorize Central Metallion Continent with the help of his Sorcerer Shogun.

episodes.name: The Arrival
episodes.overview: As the Dark Rebel Army closes in, the Kingdom of Meta-llicana falls to its knees. Its only hope lies in awakening a powerful but evil sorcerer.

episodes.name: Rampage
episodes.overview: Left with no other option, Yoko revives Dark Schneider once again when a terrifying multiheaded monster attacks the Kingdom of Meta-llicana.

episodes.name: Abduction
episodes.overview: The first of four seals that contain the God of Destruction breaks. As a crisis looms in sight, Yoko grapples with conflicting emotions.

episodes.name: Invasion
episodes.overview: Sheila and Dark Schneider set out to free Yoko, whose captor threatens to torment her unless she discloses how she unseals the powerful wizard.

episodes.name: Showdown
episodes.overview: The demon god Efreet unleashes deadly flames, and Dark Schneider must find a way out in order to save Yoko.

episodes.name: Destiny
episodes.overview: Outraged by Dark Schneider's success, Kall-Su orders Arshes Nei, a half-dark elf, to put an end to the reincarnated wizard before he grows too strong.

episodes.name: The Demon Beast
episodes.overview: Arshes Nei sends sorcerer Kai Harn to defeat Dark Schneider, who uses High Ancient Magic to try to turn him into a stone statue.

episodes.name: The Progenitor
episodes.overview: Lucien reunites with Yoko in the forest, but they are soon attacked by a Werewolf soldier working for Count Di-amon, a powerful vampire.

episodes.name: Blue Nail
episodes.overview: While Dark Schneider struggles to break free from captivity, Yoko, Kai Harn and Sean Ari fend for themselves against Di-amon.

episodes.name: The Goddess of Thunder
episodes.overview: The remaining members of the Divine Kings gather and vow to eliminate Dark Schneider. Abigail tests Arshes Nei's loyalty to their mission.

episodes.name: Prophecy
episodes.overview: Dark Schneider and Arshes Nei reunite for the first time since his reincarnation. Baba, an old woman with prophetic powers, has an alarming vision.

episodes.name: Life or Death
episodes.overview: Arshes Nei unleashes a surprise attack on the castle, getting the upper hand in her battle against a disarmed adversary.

episodes.name: Wavering
episodes.overview: Nearly equal in strength, two opponents ratchet up the rapidly escalating fight. Meanwhile, the warriors struggle with their emotions.

episodes.name: Moved to Tears
episodes.overview: After Dark Schneider's sacrifice, his allies grieve a major loss. Meanwhile, Kall-Su and Abigail’s Army of Decay continue to wreak havoc.

episodes.name: Triumphant Return
episodes.overview: Arshes and Gara face-off against Lynch but realize they are no match against the ruthless creature. Abigail receives word of Dark Schneider’s return.

episodes.name: Incantation
episodes.overview: With his newfound strength, Dark Schneider attempts to face Vivian — a Devil Mace-wielding cyclops fueled by Anthrasax’s immense power — all on his own.

episodes.name: Ring
episodes.overview: Lich reaches Meta-llicana, seeking vengeance against Dark Schneider. The two face off but Arshes notices that something is off.

episodes.name: Secrets of the Sword
episodes.overview: Yoko fearlessly stands up against Abigail. Facing Lich alone, Gara’s only chance of survival is to use the full potential of the Murasame Blade.

episodes.name: Empress of Thunder
episodes.overview: Sensing danger, Arshes heads to Meta-llicana Castle and stops Abigail in his tracks when he sets out to collect the last seal.

episodes.name: Tyranny
episodes.overview: After learning the secret of the final seal, Dark Schneider agrees to protect Sheila. Abigail reveals his true self and turns the tables on Arshes Nei.

episodes.name: Fierce Battle
episodes.overview: Dark Schneider puts up a good fight against the evolved Abigail, but things take a turn for the worst when the dark wizard’s plan backfires.

episodes.name: Conclusion
episodes.overview: The castle walls crumble with the full force of Dark Schneider’s Helloween spell, but Abigail seems unaffected. Arshes swoops in to assist her lover.

episodes.name: Annihilation
episodes.overview: Arshes and Gara stand up to Abigail but are in no condition to fight. Abigail preys on Dark Schneider’s ultimate weakness.

episodes.name: End
episodes.overview: As Abigail taunts Dark Schneider for possessing a human heart, fire spirits come to the rescue and assist the wizard in one final battle.

episodes.name: Rebellion
episodes.overview: A leading member of the Sorcerer Shogun, Yngwie von Mattström conquers one city after another. Meanwhile, samurai masters try to secure food supplies.

episodes.name: Fate
episodes.overview: Samurai centurion Jorg Fishes faces off against Sorcerer Shogun Macapine Toni Strauss. Kall-Su reveals his sinister plans to rule the world.

episodes.name: Blue Storm
episodes.overview: The samurai corps brace themselves for the upcoming invasion. With no hope in sight, Yoko attempts a spell that comes at a heavy price.

episodes.name: Dawn
episodes.overview: The tables turn when a powerful ally makes a sudden appearance. Later, a defeated Macapine Toni Strauss lands in front of an unlikely survivor.

episodes.name: Ice and Snow
episodes.overview: Di-amon barges into Kall-Su's castle and stirs chaos. As Kall-Su's powers grow uncannily strong, Shella E,Lee notices that something is off.

episodes.name: Departure
episodes.overview: Kall-Su tasks demi-humans to deal with rioters, while he has grander plans for his Sorcerer Shoguns. Yoko deals with an untamed Dark Schneider.

episodes.name: Teleportation
episodes.overview: Yoko and crew learn about Kall-Su's sinister plans. Later, they are called to the basement of the castle and discover an ancient artifact.

episodes.name: Magic Land
episodes.overview: Left in the castle, Shella E, Lee learns the shocking truth. The Sorcerer Shogun experience unexpected turbulence on their way to King Crimson Glory.

episodes.name: Legend
episodes.overview: A young village boy listens to a bedtime story about the civilization that created Anthrasax. Meanwhile, Yoko and crew land in King Crimson Glory.

episodes.name: Distant Thunder
episodes.overview: Bol Gil Bol faces off against Dark Schneider. Gara and Macapine Toni Strauss face a threat. Arshes Nei dreams of her past.

episodes.name: Holy War I
episodes.overview: When a formidable opponent makes a sudden appearance, the samurai corps have a change of heart about Dark Schneider. Sheila finds herself in danger.

episodes.name: Holy War II
episodes.overview: A fierce showdown between the samurai corps and Sorcerer Shogun takes place. Kall-Su gets dangerously close to unlocking the final seal.

episodes.name: Holy War III
episodes.overview: Sheila experiences a sudden change in condition. Kall-Su and Dark Schneider unleash an epic battle of ice versus fire.

episodes.name: Holy War IV
episodes.overview: United over a common enemy, the samurai corps inspire the grieving Sorcerer Shogun with their unwavering spirit.

episodes.name: Gathering
episodes.overview: Unconscious within the beast, Kall-Su has flashbacks to his past. Determined to save his friend, Dark Schneider wields majestic powers like no other.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: With the fall of Meta-llicana Castle and Dark Schneider, Kall-Su continues to terrorize Central Metallion Continent with the help of his Sorcerer Shogun.
